headline: Viatris (VTRS): Taking a Fresh Look at Valuation After Recent Share Price Rebound
summary: Viatris (VTRS) recently caught investors’ attention following a small but steady rebound in its stock price over the past month. This move comes after a challenging year and has prompted a fresh look at valuation and the company’s fundamentals. See our latest analysis for Viatris. Viatris has managed to claw back some ground in recent weeks as investor sentiment appears to be shifting, despite a tough broader backdrop and a sizeable year-to-date share price decline. headline: Viatris Acquires Aculys Pharma to Expand Neurology Portfolio in Japan
summary: VTRS acquires Aculys Pharma to boost its CNS portfolio in Japan, gaining rights to pitolisant and Spydia for narcolepsy and seizure management, respectively.
